name: STAT 280D
title: Seminar in Bayesian Statistical Methodology
description: Weekly seminar/discussion group on Bayesian statistical methods, covering both analytical and computational approaches. Participants present research progress and finding in semiformal discussions. Students must present their own research on a regular basis. (Formerly AMS 280D.) May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to graduate students.
